resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

kou commented on pull request #11786:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11786#issuecomment-982264559


   @mbrobbel Good catch! I've updated documentations and they don't include the pinned version now.
   
   @lidavidm It makes sense. I've sent an e-mail: 
   
   @westonpace Thanks for the hint. I've fixed it. You may be interested in R related changes after the first push:
   
   * https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11786/files#diff-ed7e64d665cf68cc6341c9ec65825f1bb234cce6d6bfa73bbd2118ae6f1f8b06

jonkeane commented on pull request #11786:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11786#issuecomment-983857784


   This is fantastic, thank you!
   
   There are a few places in `dev/tasks/tasks.yml` that had bespoke versions of `CLANG_TOOLS` to get them working that I don't think are needed anymore. I'm happy to push a commit to this branch (I would suggest changes, but GH doesn't let me do that on a file that's not near the diffs)
   
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/736a69ee7c0b0b059e08b99783a81067beca99fa/dev/tasks/tasks.yml#L1205
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/736a69ee7c0b0b059e08b99783a81067beca99fa/dev/tasks/tasks.yml#L1193


--

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11786#issuecomment-984298168


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 9ec01da19124ee93965879d11bc60538dbbe7693 and contender = f36451f8e019c152f55a5bb8538d2285d2b7b25d. f36451f8e019c152f55a5bb8538d2285d2b7b25d is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/c32b263be3a044e7968359215a48fa7c...7313c6335dee4fe284fb340ec9596f2d/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/8cbf78bd0cd642bd8f65d47beded39e8...f096d54632614727907ede0305e8816e/)

   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: langs = C++, Java
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: cloud = True
